item.title: Introducing klibs.io: A New Way to Discover Kotlin Multiplatform Libraries

item.title: AI Inspires Learners, IDEs Drive Them: Computer Science Education Trends 2024
item.description: Computer science education and literacy are skyrocketing in demand worldwide. To understand the latest trends, challenges, and motivations driving learners, as well as other factors shaping the field, we conducted the 2024 Computer Science Learning Curve Survey. item.title: 7 Reasons You Should Use dbt Core in PyCharm
item.description: dbt Core is a modern data transformation framework. It doesn‚Äôt extract or load data and is only responsible for the T in the ELT (extract-load-transform) process. dbt connects to your data warehouse and helps you prepare your data so it can later be used to answer business questions.
